title: This Thread Needs More Attention!  [Firefighter Sion]
body:
http://apollo-eu-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1436265759/sion_11.jpg

Give this man the attention he deserves for creating a flawless idea!
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/boards-feedback-en/Lv3Ijveg-sion-fanart-new-skin

replies.body:
Great illustration! We should fold this into a list of all jobs that require Chopping (future sion skins):

-Lumberjack
-Firefighter
-Butcher
-Gardener
-Wedding cake cutter
-Barber
-The possibilities are endless

wedding cake cutter is confirmed for when you guys release runaway bride mundo then?

would be a shame to waste such a nice cake (baked by chef rammus too!)

> [{quoted}](name=Captain Aishi,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=HJmp5FpM,comment-id=00010005,timestamp=2016-01-09T00:23:24.181+0000)
>
> wedding cake cutter is confirmed for when you guys release runaway bride mundo then?
> 
> would be a shame to waste such a nice cake (baked by chef rammus too!)

Or Baker Pantheon maybe?

> -Lumberjack
> -Barber

Really, couldn't both of those just be in one skin?
